parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Thickness of the gusset

parameters.name: DirType
parameters.description: Thickness direction of the gusset as defined in swGussetThicknessType_e

parameters.name: LocType
parameters.description: Location of the reference plane for the sketch of the gusset as defined in swGussetProfileLocationType_e

parameters.name: BIsProfile
parameters.description: True to use a polygon profile, false to use a triangle profile

parameters.name: ProfileD1
parameters.description: Profile Distance1 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileD2
parameters.description: Profile Distance2 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileD3
parameters.description: Profile Distance3 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileAngle
parameters.description: Profile Angle (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDim is false

parameters.name: ProfileD4
parameters.description: Profile Distance4 (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDim is true

parameters.name: BOffset
parameters.description: True to offset the reference plane for the sketch, false to not

parameters.name: DProfileOffset
parameters.description: Value by which to offset the reference plane for the sketch

parameters.name: CrvIndex
parameters.description: Index of the edge to use if multiple intersecting edges exist

parameters.name: BReverseDir
parameters.description: If BOffset set to true, then true to reverse direction, false to not

parameters.name: BReverseFace
parameters.description: Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 if triangle profile - or - Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 and reverse ProfileD3 and ProfileD4 if polygon profile

parameters.name: BUseLenDim
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD4, false to use ProfileAngle

parameters.name: ProfileD5
parameters.description: Chamfer Distance5 (see Remarks ); valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: ProfileD6
parameters.description: Chamfer Distance6 (see Remarks ); valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset and BUseLenDimForChamber are both true

parameters.name: ProfileChamferAngle
parameters.description: Chamfer Angle (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDimForChamfer is false and BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: BUseLenDimForChamfer
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD6, false to use ProfileChamferAngle; valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: BNeedChamferInGusset
parameters.description: True to create a chamfer to allow room for a weld bead under the gusset, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertGussetFeature3
description: Inserts a gusset feature for pre-selected faces of a weldment.
signature:
Feature InsertGussetFeature3( 
   System.Double
Depth
,
   System.Int16
DirType
,
   System.Int16
LocType
,
   System.Boolean
BIsProfile
,
   System.Double
ProfileD1
,
   System.Double
ProfileD2
,
   System.Double
ProfileD3
,
   System.Double
ProfileAngle
,
   System.Double
ProfileD4
,
   System.Boolean
BOffset
,
   System.Double
DProfileOffset
,
   System.Int32
CrvIndex
,
   System.Boolean
BReverseDir
,
   System.Boolean
BReverseFace
,
   System.Boolean
BUseLenDim
,
   System.Double
ProfileD5
,
   System.Double
ProfileD6
,
   System.Double
ProfileChamferAngle
,
   System.Boolean
BUseLenDimForChamfer
,
   System.Boolean
BNeedChamferInGusset
)

parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Thickness of the gusset

parameters.name: DirType
parameters.description: Thickness direction of the gusset as defined in swGussetThicknessType_e

parameters.name: LocType
parameters.description: Location of the reference plane for the sketch of the gusset as defined in swGussetProfileLocationType_e

parameters.name: BIsProfile
parameters.description: True to use a polygon profile, false to use a triangle profile

parameters.name: ProfileD1
parameters.description: Profile Distance1 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileD2
parameters.description: Profile Distance2 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileD3
parameters.description: Profile Distance3 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ProfileAngle
parameters.description: Profile Angle (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDim is false

parameters.name: ProfileD4
parameters.description: Profile Distance4 (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDim is true

parameters.name: BOffset
parameters.description: True to offset the reference plane for the sketch, false to not

parameters.name: DProfileOffset
parameters.description: Value by which to offset the reference plane for the sketch

parameters.name: CrvIndex
parameters.description: Index of the edge to use if multiple intersecting edges exist

parameters.name: BReverseDir
parameters.description: If BOffset set to true, then true to reverse direction, false to not

parameters.name: BReverseFace
parameters.description: Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 if triangle profile - or - Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 and reverse ProfileD3 and ProfileD4 if polygon profile

parameters.name: BUseLenDim
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD4, false to use ProfileAngle

parameters.name: ProfileD5
parameters.description: Chamfer Distance5 (see Remarks ); valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: ProfileD6
parameters.description: Chamfer Distance6 (see Remarks ); valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset and BUseLenDimForChamber are both true

parameters.name: ProfileChamferAngle
parameters.description: Chamfer Angle (see Remarks ); valid only if BUseLenDimForChamfer is false and BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: BUseLenDimForChamfer
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD6, false to use ProfileChamferAngle; valid only if BNeedChamferInGusset is true

parameters.name: BNeedChamferInGusset
parameters.description: True to create a chamfer to allow room for a weld bead under the gusset, false to not

remarks:
See the SOLIDWORKS Help for more information about profile and chamfer distances and angles in weldment gussets.
Before calling this method, you must call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select two faces that are the supporting legs of this gusset with a Mark of 1.
Instead of using this method, you can pass an array of faces to
IFeatureManager::InsertGussetFeature2
.
